result.name: total-discharges-by-age-and-sex-from-acute-hospitals-in-northern-ireland-by-diagnostic-group-10
result.notes: Total discharges from health and social care hospitals in Northern Ireland by age and sex and diagnostic group in the acute programme of care, 2015.

organization.name: open-data-ni
organization.title: OpenDataNI
organization.description:
[OpenDataNI] (https://www.opendatani.gov.uk) is the brand name for the Open Data portal which facilitates easy access to Northern Ireland public sector data for both reuse and redistribution. 

OpenDataNI has been developed as part of the Digital NI initiative. Digital NI aims to help establish a culture within Northern Ireland that develops and enhances Digital capability not just through interactions with Government, but also with local companies and throughout communities. Within government the Digital Transformation Service is facilitating this cultural shift through a number of methods, transforming Government services, making data open and available and encouraging and coaching those who lack digital skills.

It is recognised that opening up our data is the right thing to do in terms of transparency, accountability and efficiency of the Public Sector in Northern Ireland. It has the potential to encourage new commercial opportunities and drive economic growth and innovation across public and private sectors.

result.title: Total discharges by age and sex from acute hospitals in Northern Ireland by diagnostic group (ICD -10), 2015

extras.value: Data relate to the acute programme of care in Northern Ireland which accounts for approximately 88% of all hospital admissions. Hospital admissions in other programmes of care not included e.g. Maternity and Child Health Services, Mental Health, Learning Disability or Older People. Other publications relating to Hospital Inpatients can be accessed from the following Department of Health website pages here: https://www.health-ni.gov.uk/topics/dhssps-statistics-and-research/hospital-activity-statistics

Data are analysed from the Hospital Inpatient System (HIS) by Hospital Information Branch, Information & Analysis Directorate in the Department of Health, NI. HIS consists of validated data extracts relating to admitted patients (not outpatients) from hospital information systems (mainly the Patient Administration Systems (PAS)), across the 5 Health and Social Care Trusts in NI.

resources.description: Total discharges from acute HSC hospitals in N Ireland, 2015
